page.title: 15 FARM VISIT
page.content: Some of the class and I went and visited Trerice 2 near Newlyn East. The farm is owned by Mr Burt who got it because Trerice Manor had a lot of land which was sold because of financial problems.Most was sold to demobbed soldiers,so Mr Burt's father bought it off a soldier and Mr Burt inherited it. He has a Hereford bull,28 cows in milk,which are Jerseys and Friesians, 17 year old followers,which are also Jerseys and Friesians,150 ducks and chickens and for game birds he has 20 pheasants. There are 12 farm buildings.For implements he has a grass cutter, hay turner, cattle feeder, vibrater, slurry tanker and a Massey Ferguson tractor.
